author: 80raghavendra
content: I was reading about the committee sizes. The blogs I read say the committee size is at least 128. I previously thought it is exactly 128. Can someone confirm if it is =128 or >= 128? And I believe the required number of attestations for a block is >= 85. Correct?

author: ralexstokes
content: the protocol targets a committee size of 128 but they grow in size so that every validator is in exactly one committee each epoch, eg on mainnet committees are already larger than 128

author: ralexstokes
